abilities.desc: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every [35] seconds.
abilities.name: Shrapnel
abilities.notes: Provides vision in the targeted area.

abilities.desc: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and knock back his enemies. Headshots  briefly slow enemy movement and attack speed slowed by -100%.
abilities.name: Headshot

abilities.desc: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle. Can be activated to provide 100% Headshot chance for 3 seconds. Slows you by [45, 40, 35, 30]% for the duration.
abilities.name: Take Aim

abilities.desc: Launches a grenade at the target area, dealing damage to enemies and knocking them and Sniper himself back.  Enemies affected are disarmed and have their movement slowed after the knockback.
abilities.name: Concussive Grenade

abilities.desc: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range and mini-stuns the target.
abilities.name: Assassinate
abilities.notes: Interrupts channeling spells, including on Spell Immune units.
